title: Ultimate Ambient II (Steve Roach, Tangerine Dream, and more!)
description:
Here is the second of my two exhaustive uploads of mood music for every occasion. There are some scarce ones here -- old favorites you cannot find anymore. I hope everyone finds something new to enjoy, and sees fit to seed as long as they can.

This torrent contains:

Steve Roach - Arc of Passion, Artifacts (a personal fave), Core, Midnight Moon, Origins, and Soma (with Robert Rich) albums.

Tangerine Dream - Sorcerer OST.

Cipher - a one-off ambient album from Great Britain. Long out of print. Highly recommended.

Cross Currents - Richard Souther.

Deep Breakfast - Ray Lynch. This is the first &#039;New Age&#039; CD I ever bought.

Private City - John Surman.

Tubular Bells II - Mike Oldfield.

Ergo Proxy OST, Opus 1 & 2. Moody music from a quirky, well-drawn anime series.

This torrent, like my last, is dedicated to /x/. Were it not for them I never would have discovered about half the music in here.
